attributes.action: PROVIDE MONEY TO EACH FAMILY MONTHLY DURING THE CORONA VIRUS PERIOD
attributes.additional_details: WE WANT YOU TO DO THIS BECAUSE THE GOVERNMENT ISN'T REALLY DOING ANYTHING TO ENSURE THAT EVERYONE HAS WHAT THEY NEED TO SURVIVE. THE FUNDING AVAILABLE FROM THE CURRENT SCHEMES ISN'T ENOUGH TO FEED CERTAIN FAMILIES, AND TO AVOID THIS, THE GOVERNMENT SHOULD PROVIDE FUNDS TO HELP THE MOST VULNERABLE DURING THIS HEALTH CRISIS.
attributes.background: WE WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO GIVE FUNDS TO EVERY MEMBER OF EACH FAMILY, TO MAKE SURE THAT EVERYONE IS ABLE TO PROVIDE THEMSELVES WITH NECESSITIES TO ENSURE THAT THEY HAVE THE BEST POSSIBLE LIFE DURING THIS PANDEMIC. THERE IS ALSO HYPERINFLATION, WHICH MEANS FAMILIES CANNOT FEED THEMSELVES OR CHILDREN

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
